svg.title: AI-Enhanced Code Review System - Intelligent Review Orchestrator
svg.desc: Advanced code review platform combining AI analysis with human expertise for optimized review efficiency, quality assurance, and knowledge transfer
svg.text: Intelligent Review Orchestrator with Human-AI Collaboration

g.text: Avg Review Time: 23 min | Quality Score: 94% | Team Velocity: +42%
Team knowledge score: 92% (+12% vs last month)
‚Ä¢ Session timeout handling ‚Ä¢ Rate limiting ‚Ä¢ Error logging
Pattern detected: Similar to UserService refactor
üìñ View related examples | üí° Apply best practices

div.style: position: absolute; left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;
div.div: AI Analysis Engine with code quality analysis, security scanning, performance analysis, pattern recognition, context generation, and smart reviewer routing
Human Expertise panel showing reviewer pool with availability status and expertise matching for optimal review assignments
Knowledge Extraction system capturing patterns, best practices, and team insights for continuous learning and improvement
Code submission step with PR creation, CI/CD trigger, initial scan, and context extraction
AI analysis phase with quality checks, security scanning, performance analysis, and pattern recognition
Smart routing system with expertise matching, workload balancing, priority assignment, and context generation
Human review phase with code examination, AI guidance, collaborative notes, and decision making
Knowledge capture step with pattern extraction, best practice identification, learning points, and team sharing
Quality gate validation with final checks, compliance verification, merge decisions, and feedback loops
Deployment phase with auto-merge, CI/CD pipeline, monitoring, and success tracking
